name: Android-installapp
tagline: Polymer Install Android App Notification Element
body: # android-installapp Polymer Android Install App Notification #Usage ```html ``` attributes * pkg: package name id, * locale: language localization iso code. Supports: en, es. **Related** [https://github.com/Urucas/googleplay-app-info-api](https://github.com/Urucas/googleplay-app-info-api)
